snippet: The city’s Black Caucus acknowledges that there has been a decline in the political power of the African-American community, but leaders still see black voters as an extremely important bloc.
lead_paragraph: The city’s Black Caucus acknowledges that there has been a decline in the political power of the African-American community, but leaders still see black voters as an extremely important bloc.

headline.seo: Black Caucus of Chicago Assesses African-Americans’ Political Power
headline.main: Black Caucus Assesses a Voting Bloc’s Political Power and Sees Strength
headline.print_headline: Black Caucus Assesses a Voting Bloc’s Political Power and Sees Strength
